reference.title: Raspberry-Mint Sorbet
reference.shortdesc: This delicious sorbet is a refreshing, tart, and deiry-free treat! Read on to learn how to replicate it in your classroom's ice cream machine.

ol.li: Combine the water and sugar in a medium saucepan
Combine the mixture until the sugar is completely dissolved
Remove the mixture from heat and add the mint leaves and salt
Add the raspberries, and blend the mixture until smooth
Strain the mixture through a fine mesh strainer
Cool the mixture to room temperature, cover
Cover and refrigerate for at least two hours.
Pour the mixture through the hole in the easy-lock lid with ingredient spoutand cover it with the cap with measuring cup.
Cover and refrigerate at least two hours.
